name: Super Mario on Scratch 6 Enlightened Lite Version - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 6 Enlightened Lite Version - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 6 Enlightened Lite Version which is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/735704906

Credits: 

CODE: 

- @DuckGoose9254 for most of the code 

- @NightCat28 for bug testing support and Credits Code 

- @MusicManJoe for bug testing support and Ideas 

- @Brad-Games for some of the tick code and bug testing 

- @_meow-gobo_ for Ideas 

- @FunnyAnimatorJimTV for recyclable clones engine 

- @Grayforz24682 for Volume Slider Code, Enemy Parser Code, and the Online Code 

- @BillyBot21 and @king8766 for Semi-Solid Code 

- @griffpatch for the base collision code 

- @BILLGATESFAN for helping the clone spawning code 

- @Zelda-Animator for creative enlightenment 

ART: 

- @xXNunyaXx for the fantastic thumbnail art and the NPC character design 

- @DuckGoose9254 for most of the art 

- @NightCat28 for Art Feedback 

- @CCAnimates for Rupert 

- @legobouwer9 for Appel - Nintendo 

MUSIC: 

- @DuckGoose9254 and @NightCat28 for the Music Remixes 

- @MusicManJoe for the Final Boss Music 

- Nintendo - Midi Clef - VGMusic 

- @zachs23 for the music compression
